articles.title: Ask HN: Success with hacker news jobs

articles.title: Show HN: Regression Buddy (math practice problems)

articles.author: nyxtom
articles.title: Gmail: the slowest website I'm using
articles.description: Has anyone else noticed how incredibly terrible Gmail has become lately? In addition to a slow loading splash loading screen, the navigation isn't nearly as responsive as it used to be. Inbox was somewhat better when it was available, but I look back at class…
articles.content: Then don't use gmail. Or use gmail with an imap client if you insist on retaining that service. gmail is not the only web mail service. > I've personally switched to protonmail So what's the point of this post then?
